Articles.Content: What is the default breaking force/torque for parts that don't specify? Just curious as I wanted to change some values of mod parts I've downloaded (as they are either too high or low IMO) but I don't know what the defaults are so I can't really get a good idea of what breaks when.
I would like to know this also.
Couldn't you just look in the part.cfg?

That would tell you the breaking force/torque of that one part, but wouldn't tell you what the default is, so you wouldn't know what the breaking force/torque of a part that didn't explicitly have those values in the config would be.

Most parts do not seem to have this line in the .cfg so if i were to put one in I would like to know what the default value is. Or at the very least somebody give me the default values of some stock parts to compare.
I believe the default value for both is 22
